# CSApi.Primitive.PrepareOptions.BranchCover property

Indicate whether to omit ine coverage. Implies, and is compatible with, the -ReportFormat "opencover" option. Incompatible with `-LineCover`.

```csharp
public bool BranchCover { get; set; }
```
